org.openhubframework.openhub.core.circuitbreaker

Class CircuitBreakerAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.circuitbreaker.CircuitBreakerAutoConfiguration

  • @AutoConfigureAfter(value=org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.hazelcast.HazelcastAutoConfiguration.class)
 @ConditionalOnProperty(name="ohf.circuitbreaker.enabled",
                       havingValue="true")
public class CircuitBreakerAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    Circuit breaker AutoConfiguration. Can be enabled or disabled altogether via property . If enabled it does setup implementation of CircuitBreaker interface. Either in-memory (default), or Hazelcast-based, based on configuration properties.
    Since:
    2.2
    Author:
    Karel Kovarik

        @ConditionalOnProperty(name="ohf.circuitbreaker.impl",
                       havingValue="org.openhubframework.openhub.core.circuitbreaker.CircuitBreakerHazelcastImpl")
 @ConditionalOnBean(value=com.hazelcast.core.HazelcastInstance.class)
 @Bean
public CircuitBreaker circuitBreakerHazelCastImpl()
        Hazelcast based implementation.

      • circuitBreakerInMemoryImpl

        @ConditionalOnMissingBean(value=CircuitBreaker.class)
 @ConditionalOnProperty(name="ohf.circuitbreaker.impl",
                       havingValue="org.openhubframework.openhub.core.circuitbreaker.CircuitBreakerInMemoryImpl",
                       matchIfMissing=true)
 @Bean
public CircuitBreaker circuitBreakerInMemoryImpl()
        Default implementation is in-memory.
